channel.title: golden sun: dark dawn
channel.description:
so i got this game, and started playing it. Very happy with how it's been going :slight_smile: one thing i don't understand... why camelot introduced "points of no return in the middle of the game. The originals never had those (at least not of this magnitude); they at least allowed me to backtrack to find summons and djinni i missed.
o well, GoldenSun appreciation thread?

item.title: golden sun: dark dawn
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I need to play the GBA games again, and eventually pick this one up.

Read full topic
